content.value: I can't recommend Coin enough. If youâ€™re tired of having to deal with unfriendly bank staff, long lines and ungodly opening hours, this is the bank for you.

headline.en-US: We wanted banking to be simple. So we rebuilt it from the ground up.

content.value: Coin cards offer great rates, personalized services, and exclusive perks helping you manage your money with confidence.

headline.en-US: Earn cash back for every purchase

content.value: Get up to 3% of your cash back whenever you use the Coin card to pay for the purchases. There is no limit on rewards you can claim and no spending minimum to hit. Cash back rewards do not expire as long as your account is active. Certain restrictions apply.*

headline.en-US: Discover a whole new world of travel

content.value: With free ATM withdrawals abroad and 24/7 customer service, Coin makes traveling the easiest itâ€™s ever been. Upgrade your account and join the jet-set crowd.
